column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////First and foremost
column2: all of our staff at JINYA have been trained to treat everyone who walks through our doors with the respect
column3: courtesy and dignity that we would hope to receive in return. Secondly
column5: we can never presume an individual's status based on their appearance; if a customer takes a seat at the bar and orders food or drink
column6: we treat them with the assumption that they are paying customers.
